description:
Available languages: english - french - italian - German - Swedish - Dutch - Spanish - Polish - Czech - Portuguese 

Overview: Beware, this game is provided specifically for children. Its colorful graphics and low difficulty is addressed to a young audience (under 10). 

It is a game of trapshooting specially designed for younger children. When a level is achieved, your child gaining a picture of a cat. It can free up to 20 pictures through the 20 levels of play and build a collection. 

The difficulty is measured for the youngest! 

Genre: Casual Game 

It is a game of shooting. A minimum score is required to move to the next level. Using click screen in 20 levels suitable for children. 


Characteristics: 
- It's a game of shooting. It is easy and fun on the theme of cats 
- Three levels of difficulty 
- Intuitive control interface and simple 
- Automatic backup of progression. 
- Growth awarded 20 pictures of cats available in the collection 
- 20 levels to accomplish 
- A simple game for younger where he can play without your help 
- Gameplay and graphics suitable for children
